com.squidtopusstudios.zerobitengine.core.entity

Class ZbeEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.ashley.core.Entity
      • ZbeEntityBase
        • ZbeEntity

  • public class ZbeEntity
extends ZbeEntityBase
    Standard Entity with optional rectangle collision detection and basic physics. Note that all parameters and return values, except moveBy() which is in units, are in pixels. You can convert between using the methods from world (getWorld()) This may well change in the future to use units for everything like the Box2D entity

      • collides

        public ZbeEntity collides(ZbeEntity entity,
                 java.lang.String entityType,
                 float x,
                 float y)
        Check if source entity is colliding with any entity of type entityType
        Parameters:
        entity - entity to check collision for
        entityType - entity type to check collisions with
        x - x position of the source entity's bounds
        y - y position of the source entity's bounds
        Returns:
        the collided entity

      • collides

        public ZbeEntity collides(ZbeEntity entity,
                 java.lang.String entityType)
        Check if source entity is colliding with any entity of type entityType. Uses the entity's position for x and y
        Parameters:
        entity - entity to check collision for
        entityType - entity type to check collisions with
        Returns:
        the collided entity
